<h1 align="center">
  keen.dev
</h1>

---

This is a website that I've done that shall serve as my portfolio and blogsite. My projects and my journey as I grow to become a developer is recorded here. As much as I can, I will be updating my blog consistently.

###Technologies Used

1. Gatsby.js
2. React
3. Strapi (CMS)
4. Docker (Optional)
